<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This struct provides a way to check if a given cast is possible. It provides</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a static function called isPossible that is used to check if a cast can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// performed. It should be overridden like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// template&lt;&gt; struct CastIsPossible&lt;foo, bar&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   static inline bool isPossible(const bar &amp;b) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     return bar.isFoo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> To, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> From, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Enable = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castispossible"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castispossible">CastIsPossible</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castispossible/#a44e6fa462c45ccec1dcb2e52901e055d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castispossible/#a44e6fa462c45ccec1dcb2e52901e055d">isPossible</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> From &amp;f) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">        To, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> From,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castispossible-9606b8be452a58318a7eb689052e7cef/#a42405c951f5e0f0d1e5cb83449b53c2c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castispossible-9606b8be452a58318a7eb689052e7cef/#a42405c951f5e0f0d1e5cb83449b53c2c">isPossible</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> From &amp;f) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cast traits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// All of these cast traits are meant to be implementations for useful casts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that users may want to use that are outside the standard behavior. An</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// example of how to use a special cast called &#96;CastTrait&#96; is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// template&lt;&gt; struct CastInfo&lt;foo, bar&gt; : public CastTrait&lt;foo, bar&gt; &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Essentially, if your use case falls directly into one of the use cases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// supported by a given cast trait, simply inherit your special CastInfo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// directly from one of these to avoid having to reimplement the boilerplate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;isPossible/castFailed/doCast/doCastIfPossible&#96;. A cast trait can also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// provide a subset of those functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This cast trait just provides castFailed for the specified &#96;To&#96; type to make</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CastInfo specializations more declarative. In order to use this, the target</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Provides a cast trait that strips &#96;const&#96; from types to make it easier to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// implement a const-version of a non-const cast. It just removes boilerplate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and reduces the amount of code you as the user need to implement. You can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// use it like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// template&lt;&gt; struct CastInfo&lt;foo, bar&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ...verbose implementation...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// template&lt;&gt; struct CastInfo&lt;foo, const bar&gt; : public</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        ConstStrippingForwardingCast&lt;foo, const bar, CastInfo&lt;foo, bar&gt;&gt; &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> To, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> From, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ForwardTo&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/conststrippingforwardingcast"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/conststrippingforwardingcast">ConstStrippingForwardingCast</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove the pointer if it exists, then we can get rid of consts/volatiles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/conststrippingforwardingcast/#a073e27ce78cb25ccfa9b498586ec57ee"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/conststrippingforwardingcast/#a073e27ce78cb25ccfa9b498586ec57ee">DecayedFrom</a> = std::remove&#95;cv&#95;t&lt;std::remove&#95;pointer&#95;t&lt;From&gt;&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now if it&#39;s a pointer, add it back. Otherwise, we want a ref.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/conststrippingforwardingcast/#acb4a56713da1326d0eec9ab65906898a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/conststrippingforwardingcast/#acb4a56713da1326d0eec9ab65906898a">NonConstFrom</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::conditional&#95;t&lt;std::is&#95;pointer&#95;v&lt;From&gt;, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/conststrippingforwardingcast/#a073e27ce78cb25ccfa9b498586ec57ee">DecayedFrom</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/conststrippingforwardingcast/#a073e27ce78cb25ccfa9b498586ec57ee">DecayedFrom</a> &amp;&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/conststrippingforwardingcast/#a9b9f6ed4ef6ac1d1d5e99ee4a7866e8f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/conststrippingforwardingcast/#a9b9f6ed4ef6ac1d1d5e99ee4a7866e8f">isPossible</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> From &amp;f) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ForwardTo::isPossible(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/conststrippingforwardingcast/#acb4a56713da1326d0eec9ab65906898a">NonConstFrom</a></span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(f));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Provides a cast trait that uses a defined pointer to pointer cast as a base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for reference-to-reference casts. Note that it does not provide castFailed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and doCastIfPossible because a pointer-to-pointer cast would likely just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// return &#96;nullptr&#96; which could cause nullptr dereference. You can use it like</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   template &lt;&gt; struct CastInfo&lt;foo, bar &#42;&gt; &#123; ... verbose implementation... &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   template &lt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   struct CastInfo&lt;foo, bar&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       : public ForwardToPointerCast&lt;foo, bar, CastInfo&lt;foo, bar &#42;&gt;&gt; &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> To, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> From, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ForwardTo&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/forwardtopointercast"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/forwardtopointercast">ForwardToPointerCast</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/forwardtopointercast/#a0077da5dae53fb2b6b51fb525959619d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/forwardtopointercast/#a0077da5dae53fb2b6b51fb525959619d">isPossible</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> From &amp;f) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ForwardTo::isPossible(&amp;f);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CastInfo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This struct provides a method for customizing the way a cast is performed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It inherits from CastIsPossible, to support the case of declaring many</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CastIsPossible specializations without having to specialize the full</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CastInfo.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In order to specialize different behaviors, specify different functions in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// your CastInfo specialization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For isa&lt;&gt; customization, provide:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#96;static bool isPossible(const From &amp;f)&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For cast&lt;&gt; customization, provide:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  &#96;static To doCast(const From &amp;f)&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For dyn&#95;cast&lt;&gt; and the &#42;&#95;if&#95;present&lt;&gt; variants&#39; customization, provide:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  &#96;static To castFailed()&#96; and &#96;static To doCastIfPossible(const From &amp;f)&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Your specialization might look something like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  template&lt;&gt; struct CastInfo&lt;foo, bar&gt; : public CastIsPossible&lt;foo, bar&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    static inline foo doCast(const bar &amp;b) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      return foo(const&#95;cast&lt;bar &amp;&gt;(b));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    static inline foo castFailed() &#123; return foo(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    static inline foo doCastIfPossible(const bar &amp;b) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      if (!CastInfo&lt;foo, bar&gt;::isPossible(b))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        return castFailed();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      return doCast(b);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The default implementations of CastInfo don&#39;t use cast traits for now because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we need to specify types all over the place due to the current expected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// casting behavior and the way cast&#95;retty works. New use cases can and should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// take advantage of the cast traits whenever possible!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> To, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> From, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Enable = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castispossible">CastIsPossible</a>&lt;To, From&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo/#a694f5e7233cf55082a0ac75f3e0eabaf"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo/#a694f5e7233cf55082a0ac75f3e0eabaf">Self</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo">CastInfo&lt;To, From, Enable&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo/#a93bebb67e4960a08613dff9ecc05962c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo/#a93bebb67e4960a08613dff9ecc05962c">CastReturnType</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cast-retty/#a0d0742bb7aea37fe3e710d59eb825bf7">cast&#95;retty&lt;To, From&gt;::ret&#95;type</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo/#a143f6f757917e1245aed3882209b466f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo/#a93bebb67e4960a08613dff9ecc05962c">CastReturnType</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo/#a143f6f757917e1245aed3882209b466f">doCast</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> From &amp;f) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cast-convert-val">cast&#95;convert&#95;val</a>&lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">        To, From,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/simplify-type/#a6f12135ed9ee0ba54bd08387bc1e8f10">simplify&#95;type&lt;From&gt;::SimpleType</a>&gt;::doit(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">From &amp;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(f));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This assumes that you can construct the cast return type from &#96;nullptr&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is largely to support legacy use cases - if you don&#39;t want this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// behavior you should specialize CastInfo for your use case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo/#a09597b5e97eabe6d1cc60e6846a989a3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo/#a93bebb67e4960a08613dff9ecc05962c">CastReturnType</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo/#a09597b5e97eabe6d1cc60e6846a989a3">castFailed</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/castinfo/#a93bebb67e4960a08613dff9ecc05962c">CastReturnType</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">); &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This struct provides an overload for CastInfo where From has simplify&#95;type</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ValueIsPresent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abb1384d1bc3c19c72571a6bea5a42c3b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abb1384d1bc3c19c72571a6bea5a42c3b">IsNullable</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::is&#95;pointer&#95;v&lt;T&gt; || std::is&#95;constructible&#95;v&lt;T, std::nullptr&#95;t&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ValueIsPresent provides a way to check if a value is, well, present. For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pointers, this is the equivalent of checking against nullptr, for Optionals</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// this is the equivalent of checking hasValue(). It also provides a method for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// unwrapping a value (think calling .value() on an optional).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generic values can&#39;t &#42;not&#42; be present.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operator returns true when the value can be cast to any type in &#96;Types&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// SmallVector&lt;Type&gt; myTypes = ...;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... Types&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Function object wrapper for the &#96;llvm::isa&#95;and&#95;present&#96; type check. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// function call operator returns true when the value can be cast to any type</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// in &#96;Types&#96;, or if the value is not present (e.g., nullptr). Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// SmallVector&lt;Type&gt; myTypes = ...;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if (llvm::all&#95;of(myTypes, llvm::IsaAndPresentPred&lt;VectorType&gt;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... Types&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> detail::IsaAndPresentCheckPredicate&lt;Types...&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a48f99479d17c4dc2363a90754021189c"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a48f99479d17c4dc2363a90754021189c">IsaAndPresentPred</a>&#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;SUPPORT&#95;CASTING&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
